hiveArticle.title: And the Winner is Steem
hiveArticle.body:
## And the Winner is Steem, Me and You, as well as all the Steemians who have participated in the contest.

## This shows the power of community. Thank you all.

<center>![unnamed.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNv2EYZ2fVhZBRWwctPr8AhKSrQgN9XtYkg3BGNAiMhNx/unnamed.png)</center>

# The email too says so

<center>![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmangoq5Z6UMFoSVf27arFBKpkWxiN1qpEWKcxmMvWXbHB/image.png)</center>

PC : contest.netcoins.com
